entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -6.9°C

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:03 AM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 10:03 AM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
